charges.charge_description: 18:371.F-CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES W/ FORFEITURE ALLEGATIONS(1)

charges.charge_disposition: A total term of 40 months imprisonment. 16 months as to Counts One and Two, to run concurrently, and 24 months as to Count 13, to run consecutively. To run concurrently with Sullivan County, Tennessee, General Sessions Court Docket Number 2017-RK-49262; A total term of three (3) years supervised release. Three (3) years as to Counts One and Two, and one (1) year as to Count 13, to run concurrently; Restitution of $1,943.76 to be jointly and severally liable with Luis Hernandez-Ugando (2:17-cr-73-002); Special Assessment of $300.00
